detail_desc: Short wrap dress in an airy crêpe weave with a V-neck, ties at the waist, long, flounced sleeves and a gently flared skirt with a seam and flounce at the hem. Unlined.
Small plastic hair elastics.
Two pairs of 5-pocket shorts in stretch cotton twill with a zip fly and button and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Short-sleeved polo shirt in stretch cotton jersey with a collar and button placket. Slim fit.
Knee-length, sleeveless dress in woven fabric with a double-layered top, V-neck and sewn-in wrapover at the front. Concealed zip at the back and a seam with a tie belt at the waist. Unlined skirt.
Hat in a soft rib knit with a turned-up hem.
Imitation leather espadrilles with imitation suede details. Cotton canvas linings and insoles and fluted rubber soles with a braided jute trim.
Cotton twill fisherman’s hats, one with an all-over print. Lined. Width of brim approx 4.5 cm.

Playsuit in an airy, patterned viscose weave with adjustable shoulder straps and elasticated edge at the back. Elasticated seam and a decorative bow at the waist, diagonal side pockets and short legs. Unlined.
Body in soft jersey with a V-neck, long sleeves and concealed press-studs at the crotch.
Hipster briefs in cotton jersey with lace details, a low waist, lined gusset and cutaway coverage at the back.

Calf-length, off-the-shoulder dress in a cotton weave with narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and an elasticated seam and frill trim around the top. Long balloon sleeves with elasticated cuffs, a detachable tie belt at the waist and a seam at the hem with a wide, flared flounce. Unlined.
V-neck T-shirt in soft cotton jersey.
Fitted, knee-length dress in a soft, rib-knit viscose blend with a sheen. Turtle neck and long sleeves. Unlined.
Long skirt in a Tencel™ lyocell and viscose weave with a high waist, concealed zip at the back and gently flared hem with a slit at the front. Slightly longer at the back. Unlined.
Jumper in a soft knit with a motif on the front, gently dropped shoulders and long sleeves.
Hat in felted fabric with a grosgrain band. Width of brim 6 cm.

Trousers in a cotton weave with a zip fly and button, diagonal side pockets and flap leg and back pockets with concealed press-studs. Concealed drawstring at the hems. Regular Fit – a classic fit with good room for movement over the thighs and knees to create a comfortable, straight silhouette.
Fully lined swimsuit with a print motif on the front, a round neckline and narrow shoulder straps that cross at the back.
Double-layered headband in a soft, chunky knit with a knot detail at the front.
V-neck blouse in a crinkled viscose weave with lace details, a small frilled collar and long raglan sleeves. Smocking and a flounce at the cuffs and hem.
Ballet pumps in glittery imitation leather with an elastic strap with a decorative velour bow over the foot. Imitation leather linings, quilted satin insoles and thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles.
Short, fitted, one-shoulder top in ribbed jersey with a cut-out section at the top and one long sleeve.
High-waisted jeggings in stretch denim with a zip fly and button, fake front pockets and real back pockets.

Calf-length, V-neck kaftan woven in a Tencel™ lyocell blend with a slight sheen. Relaxed fit with dropped shoulders, 3/4-length sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups, and a seam with a double drawstring at the waist. Concealed press-studs at the front and welt side pockets. Unlined.
Calf-length dress in a soft, rib-knit viscose blend with a V-neck, decorative buttons down the front, long sleeves and high slits in the sides.
Jacquard-knit slippers with a hook and loop fastening at the back of the shaft, soft pile linings and soft soles with anti-slip protectors.
Headband knitted in a soft mohair and wool blend with a wrapover detail at the front.
Short, A-line dress in woven fabric with a sheen. Square neckline, voluminous flutter sleeves and a gathered seam and flounce at the hem for added volume. Lined.
Chinos in washed cotton with an adjustable, elasticated waist, zip fly and button, side pockets and a fake welt back pocket with a button.
Round-necked T-shirt in soft jersey.

Short dress in lightweight viscose twill with a sheen. A-line style with a high, smocked collar and decorative gathers at the top, an opening with concealed hook-and-eye fasteners at the back and long balloon sleeves with a puff at the shoulders and smocking at the cuffs.

Jumpsuit in crinkled jersey with a V-neck, buttons at the top, a chest pocket and side pockets. Short dolman sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups, an elasticated seam and tie belt at the waist and straight, wide legs.
Top and a pair of leggings in soft organic cotton jersey. Top with short cap sleeves and a chest pocket. Leggings with an elasticated waist.
Handbag in imitation leather with a glittery print and appliqués on the front, two glittery handles at the top and a zip with a rainbow-coloured, faux fur pompom. Lined. Size 8x14x20 cm.
Sleeveless body in ribbed viscose jersey with a deep V-neck front and back, a flatlock seam down the back and concealed press-studs at the crotch.
Long-sleeved blouse in woven fabric with a V-neck, asymmetric seam under the bust and buttons down the front. Smocking at the back of the hem and at the cuffs. Unlined.

Slightly longer blouse in woven fabric with a grandad collar, buttons down the front and decorative gathers at the shoulders. Yoke with a pleat at the back for added width and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs.
Soft bandeau bras in lace and jersey with a silicone trim at the top and support panels in the sides. Mesh lining at the front.
Jumper in a soft, textured-knit cotton blend with a ribbed turtle neck, dropped shoulders, long sleeves and slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back.
Jumper in fine-knit cotton with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Cold shoulder top in soft jersey with short sleeves that have a decorative tie detail.

Trainers with imitation leather details, a lightly padded top edge, elasticated lacing and a hook and loop tab at the front, and a loop at the back. Mesh linings and insoles and thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles.
Lightweight, padded gilet with a hood, zip down the front and side pockets with a concealed zip. Lined. Polyester filling.
T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with a print motif on the front.
Ankle-length chinos in stretch cotton with a regular waist, zip fly and button, side pockets, fake welt back pockets and straight-cut legs that taper gently to the hems with creases.
LOVE STORIES x H&M. Bikini briefs in microfibre and lace with a low waist, lined gusset, narrow sides and medium coverage at the back.
Set with a T-shirt and pair of shorts in soft, organic cotton jersey. T-shirt with a ribbed trim around the neckline. Shorts with an elasticated waist and pockets in the side seams.
Long shirt in an airy viscose weave with a collar, buttons down the front and chest pocket. Long sleeves with buttoned cuffs and a rounded hem with slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back.
Calf-length skirt in woven fabric with a high waist, concealed zip in one side and wide tie belt. Sewn-in wrapover at the front with draping. Unlined.
Joggers in a linen and cotton weave in a relaxed fit with an elasticated drawstring waist, fake fly, and slightly lower crotch. Side pockets, welt back pockets and tapered legs with ribbed hems.
T-shirt in soft jersey with a low, roll-edge neckline and roll edges around the sleeves.
Cold shoulder blouse in woven fabric with narrow, adjustable shoulder straps, elastication and a flounce at the top, long sleeves with elastication at the cuffs, and a smocked hem.
Top in sweatshirt fabric with dropped shoulders, long sleeves, a seam across the chest and back, and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Short-sleeved, wrapover bodysuits in soft, organic cotton jersey with press-studs down one side and at the crotch.
Fully lined swimsuit with a flounce at the top that continues over one shoulder, and padded cups with removable inserts.
T-shirt in cotton jersey with an interactive motif on the front and narrow ribbing around the neckline.
Suede ankle boots with a concealed zip in one side and covered block heels. Satin linings, twill insoles and rubber soles. Heel 5.5 cm.
Short, voluminous dress in an airy, pattern-weave cotton blend with a crinkled effect. Narrow, adjustable shoulder straps that cross at the back and a wide flounce layered over the top. Lined.
Jumper in a soft, patterned fine knit with a round neckline and long sleeves. Soft brushed finish.
Long jacket in woven fabric with peak lapels, a single button fastening at the front and welt front pockets. Lined.

Biker jacket in soft imitation leather with quilted details, notch lapels with press-studs and a diagonal zip down the front. Zipped chest pocket and side pockets, a small flap pocket with a press-stud at the front, an inner pocket with a concealed press-stud, and a zip at the cuffs. Lined.
Satin tie. Width 6.5 cm. The polyester content of the tie is partly recycled.
Cap in patterned twill with an adjustable plastic fastener at the back.
Jumper in a slub cotton knit with a round neck, long sleeves and visible seams at the back.
Short-sleeved polo shirt in cotton piqué with a ribbed collar, button placket, small embroidery detail on the chest and short slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back.
Cardigan in a soft, fine-knit viscose blend with buttons down the front and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Short slip in stretch fabric designed with the minimum number of seams for a comfortable feel against the skin and minimal visibility under clothes. Narrow, adjustable shoulder straps.
Cheeky briefs in microfibre with a lace back section, low waist, lined gusset, wide sides and high cut at the back.
Long-sleeved jumpsuit in woven fabric with an opening and button at the back of the neck. Side pockets, an elasticated seam at the waist with a detachable tie belt, and wide, straight legs. Unlined.
High-waisted, pleated skirt in woven fabric with a concealed zip in one side and asymmetric hem. Lined.
Scarf in a soft cotton moss-stitch knit with a faux fur pompom at each end. The scarf can be fastened with a loop under one side.

Metal watch with a narrow, adjustable strap in imitation leather with a metal buckle and a marble-patterned print on the face. Width of strap 1.5 cm, total length 22 cm. Diameter of watch approx. 3.3 cm.
Hooded top in jersey with a print motif on the front kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
STUDIO COLLECTION. Wide jumper knitted in a lambswool and alpaca wool blend with a vertical seam down the front, low dropped shoulders and extra-long sleeves. Longer back with a fringed hem.

Tailored jacket in a stretch cotton weave with a stand-up collar, decorative shoulder tabs and concealed buttons down the front. Chest pocket, flap front pockets with a concealed press-stud, buttoned cuffs and a pleat at the back. Unlined.
Fine-knit tights with an elasticated waist.
Narrow velvet scarf with a shimmering finish and fringes at the ends. Size 13x150 cm.
Soft, stretch waist bag designed for running. Zip at the front, adjustable elastication, a plastic fastener and reflective details. Size 9x25 cm.
Long-sleeved jumper in soft, fine-knit cotton with narrow ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
